items.sentence: Nobody will pay that much for something like that.
Not everything in this world is measured in money.
Only one person knows the answer to this question.
It took a lot longer than I thought it would take.
It took me a long time to convince Tom to do that.
It took me an hour and a half to get there by car.
It took us three hours to come to this conclusion.
I\'ve got Tom\'s address somewhere on my computer.
If you\'re not watching the TV, I\'ll turn it off.
I\'ve been wanting to ask you out for a long time.
